function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High infection rate caused by close contact between health care workers and patients","Impact":"Shortage of health care workers and increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Reduce contact time between health care workers and patients","Technologies":"Medical robotics, remote prediagnosis, separate pathways and rooms","People":"Health care workers, patients","Owner":"Health care institutions, policymakers"},{"Description":"Use of medical robotics in treatment process","Impact":"Reduced contact between patients and doctors, improved efficiency of health care workers","Mitigation":"Implement medical robotics for treatment procedures","Technologies":"Medical robotics","People":"Health care workers, patients","Owner":"Health care institutions, policymakers"},{"Description":"Application of other types of robotics in hospitals for various tasks","Impact":"Automation of tasks, reduced need for human contact","Mitigation":"Implement robotics for sterilization, delivery, sample transfer, and diagnostic testing","Technologies":"Other types of robotics","People":"Health care workers, patients","Owner":"Health care institutions, policymakers"}]}
